summary: Replaces vanilla shouts with unique male shouts.
descriptionHtml:
==
[size=5][color=Mediumspringgreen]DESCRIPTION[/color][/size] [color=Yellow]Updated![/color] 
==
Only for male!
Replaces vanilla shouts with unique male shouts

==
[color=Red]READ[/color]

Upload file UPDATE:

 - Accidentally uploaded 1st Main file with Paarthunax voice. Those are the files that weren\'t replaced. There are no conflicts. 
 - Uploaded an alternate main file for ONLY uniquemale shouts (shown in video)


==
Other shout:
- [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4647]Dragon Shouts[/url]


==
Installation in download folder
==
